description.english: Buy the Sculpting Tools so you can craft the town table
Reach the 2nd world, where there's lots of sand... I hate sand...
Reach world 3, the coolest world in the game!
You've done better than people who ditch after a few hours!
You're easily in the top 50% of players now!
You've done better than most of my IRL friends who totally exist and aren't made up!
You're easily in the top 5% now, that's something to be proud of maybe kind of!
Your level is so massive it needs three digits! Just 4 more and you'll have a phone number!
10,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy 1400 nomwiches!
1,000,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy almost 91,000 rolls of Cue Tape!
100,000,000 copper coins worth, that's enough to buy 3.8 million hot dogs!
Contribute 500 GP to your guild, proving you aren't that kid in the school project who lets others do everything!
Contribute 3000 GP to your guild, putting yourself above fellow members who only have the 500 GP achievement!
Contribute 20000 GP to your guild, which means your probably the best bow-wow in your guild!
Create your 2nd character, who will probably never be as good as your 1st character.
Create your 4th character, who will never appreciate the struggle the earlier characters went through from having no family bonus stats.
Create your 8th character, who will never get the love and affection you gave your first few characters when making new characters was still special
Complete 25 Quests on a single character. They're called Quests but they're more like chores tbh
Complete 75 Quests on a single character. Seriously these are just errands the NPC's didn't wanna do.
Complete 150 Quests on a single character. The name speaks for itself.
Collect 10 unique cards. Who knows you may even get a Baba Yaga Rookie Card!
Collect 30 unique cards. If u wanna trade I got some spare Amarok cards!
Collect 120 unique cards. This basically makes you like, THE guy who does the card stuff!
Craft the Anvil II expander. More things to craft, yay!
Craft the Anvil III expander. More things to craft, again, yay!
Defeat the big poop and the giant house with legs!
Defeat the big hourglass and the toilet paper guy!
If u love me let me go... erm, I mean get a score of 13 in the Spike Minigame
Reach the top of the Giant Tree, then jump off... wait no don't do that last part.
Get a score of 103+ in the Mining Minigame, beating the Developer's score!
Get a score of 141+ in the Choppin' Minigame, beating the Developer's score!
Get a score of 67+ in the Fishing Minigame, beating the Developer's score!
Get a score of 128+ in the Catching minigame, beating the Developer's score!
Defeat your first Crystal Monster! These have a 1 in 2000 chance to spawn each time you defeat a normal monster.
Defeat 100 Crystal Monsters! This could go a couple rounds...
Defeat 2000 Crystal Monsters to become the Heavyweight Champion of IdleOn!
Defeat Amarok on Chaotic Difficulty. He's all bark and... well, all bite too honestly.
Defeat Efaunt on Chaotic Difficulty. Watch out for his new kick attack, and for all his old attacks since they're still deadly!
You kept the tutorial oil you get from the goblin?? You sneaker little gamer you!
You gave up all those peanuts just for a secret class... was it really worth it?
Shake it! To the left, to the left! Oh yea!!!
Hey, it was super cool to meet you gamer!
Complete Glumlee's part of the Main Questline
Complete the Picnic Stowaway's part of the Main Questline
Complete Stiltzcho's part of the Main Questline
Choose one of the 3 starting classes, since like there are only 3 starting classes and not 4.
Claim 100 hours of AFK Gains. That's like 4 days and a side of fries.
Claim 2000 hours of AFK Gains. That's like 3 months but not really cuz u have multiple characters.
Claim 30,000 hours of AFK gains. That's like 2 years, but again it's really more like 2 months cuz you have so many peeps in ur squad.
Claim 111,000 hours of AFK gains. Jeez, ok that's like an entire year, even with all your character idling to the max lol
Equip any trophy. Well, almost any trophy, limited-time trophies don't count.
Your level has reached a point where people debate whether or not it is possible!
Defeat 5 Giant Monsters. You'll learn about these at the Prayer Rock in the Frostbite Tundra town.
Rank up the Explosive Combustion refinery chamber to rank 2.
Beat wave 50 of Wakawaka War without using more than 1 of any specific tower type. So just 1 boulder, 1 freeze, etc...
Get a Dementia Skull or higher on every mob within World 3 in the Deathnote feature. I probably don't have to specify "or higher" here lol
You SOLD gems to the shop..? All at once? How many? Nice.
Defeat both mutant Minibosses: The Dilapidated Slush of World 3, and the Mutated Mush of World 4.
Ah, I see you enjoy reading upgrade flavor text as well!
Trash 1000 pets. How could you be so heartless, so cold...
Reach World 4, the purple world with all the space stuff and things!
Defeat enough Green Mushrooms to unlock the portal to FROGS!
Defeat enough Frogs to unlock the portal to BEANS!
Defeat enough Beans to unlock the portal to SLIMES!
Defeat enough Slimes to unlock the portal to BABY BOAS!
Defeat enough Baby Boas to unlock the portal to CARROTMEN!
Defeat enough Carrotmen to unlock the portal to GLUBLINS!
Defeat enough Glublins to unlock the portal to THE BOSS!
Chop 15 yellow sections in a row during the Choppin' Minigame.
Have a stack of exactly 500 Copper Ore in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 1500 Oak Logs in your Storage Chest.
Equip the Copper Helmet and Copper Platebody
Defeat 250 Wode Boards with at least 1 other party member
Have a stack of exactly 2,000 Iron Ore in your Storage Chest.
Defeat all Giga Frogs before any respawn.
Defeat Amarok, the stone golem wolf of the Encroaching Forest.
Defeat 25,000 slimes in total. This counts kills from all your characters!
Equip an Iron Helmet, Iron Chestplate, Iron Pants, and one Iron Tool.
Have a stack of exactly 20,000 Sticks in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 20,000 Forest Fibers in your Storage Chest.
Get a score of 25,000 or more in the Dewdrop Colosseum.
Have a stack of exactly 30,000 Gold Ore in your Storage Chest.
Slam on a yellow ore vein in the Mining Minigame, which gives 3 points!
Defeat 500 Rats with at least 1 other party member
Reach the top of the Giant Tree in Blunder Hills
Enter the Sewers with no equipment or weapon, and defeat a sewer poop. Don't want to get your stuff dirty after all!
Defeat Baba Yaga in under 25 seconds after they spawn in the Birch Enclave
Have a stack of exactly 200,000 Platinum Ore in your Storage Chest.
Craft 42 golden peanuts, whatever those might be!
Equip Golden Helmet, Chestplate, Pants, Shoes, two Golden tools, and the Defenders Dignity ring.
Equip all 4 pieces of Amarok armor.
Have a stack of exactly 500,000 Veiny Logs in your Storage Chest.
Equip the Blunder Hero Trophy, while also having another in your inventory.
Have a stack of exactly 1,000,000 Void Ore in your Storage Chest.
Punch a monster, win the Jackpot! Well, hypothetically...
Climb the 2nd tallest tree in all of Blunder Hills, and say 'Great view, 1 star'
Find the secret mining area
Score a point in the Choppin' Minigame while the leaf is ZOOMING!!!
Say 'Hi' to 250 different people without closing the game.
Reach The Roots, which is the map below the Sticks monsters in the Giant Tree
Deal 100 or more damage in a single hit in any party dungeon.
Defeat Grandfrogger on his 1st Difficulty.
Defeat Grandfrogger on his 2nd Difficulty.
Defeat Grandfrogger on his 3rd Difficulty.
Spawn Grandfrogger within 2 minutes of entering the dungeon.
Defeat Grandfrogger on his 4th Difficulty, and avoid becoming one with the soup...
Pass through the small golden hoop in the Catching Minigame. It's worth 3 points!
Level up the 'Hammer Hammer' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 10
Say 'Hi' to 100 unique people without closing the game or changing Servers.
Have a stack of exactly 1500 Goldfish in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 2500 Flies in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 15 Glass Shards in your Storage Chest.
Leave one of your players AFK for an entire week, which is 168 hours! Anything more counts too!
Get 3 vials to Lv. 4, which are the green ones
Choose a subclass for two of your characters.
Have 10 Silver Obols equipped at once. The Family tab counts here!
Complete 75 unique quests on a single character. I'm not sure what B-o-B stands for either...
Catch a total of 1000 fish across all Fishing Minigame plays.
Level up the 'FMJ' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 30
Defeat 250,000 Sandy Pots combined across all characters. Forget the Pillars of Salt though.
Get 6 vials to Lv. 7, which are the pink ones
Level up cards for Mafioso, Sandcastle, Pincermin, and Mashed Potato, all up to 1 star.
Run from Town to Efaunt's Tomb in under 2 minutes. No teleporting using the World Map.
Have 15 Golden Obols equipped at once. The Family tab counts here!
Defeat 160 Sand Giants within 10 minutes of entering the map. Auto must be off.
Have a stack of exactly 6000 Jellyfish in your Storage Chest. I heard their Jelly goes good with burgers btw.
Have a stack of exactly 50,000 Sentient Cereal in your Storage Chest.
Get a Score of 200,000 or more in the Sandstone Colosseum
Use 101 silver pens in the Post Office
Pass through the teenie tiny Lava hoop in the Catching Minigame. It only appears if you go through 25 hoops in a row!
Level up the 'Smarty Boi' Alchemy bubble to Lv. 50
Have the YumYum Sheriff trophy equipped, while also having another in your inventory.
Kill Crabbycakes manually, without Auto on, until one drops a Nuget Cake. Good luck...
Have a stack of exactly 100,000 Bloaches in your Storage Chest.
Get 10 vials to Lv. 9, which are the hyperlight Orange ones. Stop focusing so much on vials, it's not healthy!
Have a stack of exactly 1,000,000 Fruit Flies in your Storage Chest.
Wear the Efaunt helmet, Ribcage, Hipillium, and Ankles. Also have 1 Efaunt Obol equipped.
Complete all available Treasure Hunts! You can find them on Youtube, just search for it!
Pickles belong in containers, after all!
I'm tellin' ya, the fish ain't bitin' today gosh darn it!
Goldric's bag of peanuts may be nearly empty, but even just one peanut is enough for some...
Defeat Snakenhotep on his 1st Difficulty.
Defeat Snakenhotep on his 2nd Difficulty.
Defeat Snakenhotep on his 3rd Difficulty.
Wazam 125 rooms in Snakenhotep's Dungeon by performing exceptionally well in a room.
Pass 30 rooms in Snakenhotep's Dungeon by doing the thingy the room says to do.
Deal 1000 or more damage in a single hit within any Dungeon.
Have a stack of exactly 250 Doge -I mean froge- critters in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 1,000 Forest Souls in your Storage Chest.
Checkout a total of 1000 talent books from the Talent Book Library.
Have 4 unclaimed Yellow Cogs during any single moment in time, apart from March 16, 2026 at 3.07pm
Get a Copper Skull or higher on every Blunder Hills monster in the Deathnote.
You're gonna kill all them lil' poofs? You monster... well, at least make it quick, like 20s or less after entering the map.
Have 4 Prayers in your Prayer Rock thingy. You get Prayers by placing these wizard dudes into towers and stuff and kickin' butt!
Beat wave 50 in Glublin Gorefest using ONLY Boulder Roller wizards. No freeze, no confetti, just boulder.
Have 20 Grey Cogs placed on the board at once. Not sure why this is an achievement, cogs are boring.
Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 50 times. Any buildings, utilities, wizards, shrines, they all count!
Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 250 times.
Manually loot 1000 floof poofs, then 1000 melty cubes, then 1000 moustache combs. So 3000 in total!
Defeat 5 Giant Mobs of each type; Bloque, Mamooth, Snowman, Penguin, then Thermister, IN THAT ORDER. So 25 in total!
Get a Golden Skull or higher on every YumYum Desert monster in the Deathnote.
Have a stack of exactly 10,000 Dune Souls in your Storage Chest.
Remember all those pens you lent out in school and never got back? You've got 13 seconds to vent your anger on every penguin mob!
Have a stack of exactly 60,000 Mouseys in your Storage Chest. Imagine the noise in that chest of yours... or even the smell, ugh.
Have 40 Yellow Cogs placed on the board at once. Alright now I see how this is achievement worthy, cogs are kinda neat.
Rank up the Spontaneous Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 3.
Rank up the Redox Combustion refinery chamber to Rank 10.
Upgrade buildings in construction a total of 900 times.
Have 16 unclaimed Grey Cogs at once. Jeez, I'm glad anthropomorphic cogs aren't real.
78 Cogs. All purple cogs. Did I say cogs are great? I think cogs are great. Cog cog cog!
Have a stack of exactly 250,000 Rooted Souls in your Storage Chest.
Beat wave 50 of Acorn Assault with just 4 towers active. Place down a 5th tower at any time, and it wont count!
Have a HONK of exactly 1,000,000 Honkers in your HONK Chest. HONKHONKHONK HOOOONK!!!
Have a stack of exactly 500 Black Lenses in your Storage Chest. Better complete this before I make it 1,000!
Defeat every Bloodbone in just 12 seconds after entering the map. Wow, wild.
Get a Score of 2,500,000 or more in the Chillsnap Colosseum
Deal 25000 or more damage in a single hit within any Dungeon.
Defeat Glaciaxus on its 1st difficulty
Defeat Glaciaxus on its 2nd difficulty
Defeat Glaciaxus on its 3rd difficulty
Complete 1000 jobs within the Glacial Basement dungeon.
Find the Equinox Mirror drop from Bloodbones, a 1 in 1000 drop, and use it to visit the Equinox Valley.
Have a stack of exactly 75,000 TV remotes in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 800,000 Bottle Caps in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 10,000,000 Wriggly Balls in your Storage Chest. Green Stack bro!
Accumulate 8760 hours, or an entire year, of Lab AFK time across all players.
What exactly were you expecting to cook, an invisible meal?
Get a Breedability III heart on at least 2 Pets within the nest.
Get a Breedability VII heart on at least 15 pets within the nest.
Have 6 bronze (or rarer) eggs in your nest at the same time, waiting to be hatched!
Have 12 gold (or rarer) eggs in your nest at the same time, waiting to be hatched!
Fail a pet battle with the enemy team having only 5% HP or less. Wait, barely it's spelled HOW???
Have 5 kitchens all cooking cabbages at the same time. Remember gamers, eat your vegetables, they ain't so bad!
Have 8 kitchens all cooking Pretzels at the same time. Don't get it twisted, them pretzels are the real deal.
Upgrade any kitchen stat to Lv. 300, giving you an elite crown over the upgrade bars, thus resulting in dopamine.
Have a speed of 'Too Fast' displayed while cooking an Eggplant. No this is not a metaphor.
Complete all constellations in the Hyperion Nebula. Thats what world 4 is called btw.
Claim 25 chips from the Chip Repository. I was gonna make this 250 chips, but people from the future told me not to.
Claim spices by any means 10,000 times. Like, individual claims.
Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a diamond plate!
Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a purple plate!
Upgrade a meal at the Dinner Menu to the point where it gets a void pearl plate!
Dance with at least 5 other people while you're all in World 4 town!
Get a Score of 10,000,000 or more in the Astro Colosseum
Beat wave 50 of Clash of Cans with 3 Poisonic Elders at Lv 5 or higher. Also, you can't sell towers.
Reach a total of 1 million Orb Kills.
Reach a total of 1 million Plunderous Kills. This one is the true challenge of the three.
Reach a total of 1 million Wormhole Kills.
Destruction comes to all who cross your path, no matter how many times you cross paths.
Have a stack of exactly 200,000 Maple Logs in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 5,000,000 Orange Slices in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 100,000,000 Mongo Worm Slices in your Storage Chest.
Reach level 300 on any character! My oh my! This would have been inconceivable just a few years ago!
Complete all constellations in the Smolderin' Plateau. You can check your progress within the Telescope.
Reach World 5, a personal favorite world of mine! Look, I like lava what can I say.
Reach Wave 50 of Citric Conflict tower defence without placing a single Kraken Towers. Not even one.
Collect 15 Artifacts from Sailing
Collect all 30 Artifacts from Sailing
Collect all 30 ANCIENT Artifacts from Sailing. All that glitters is not gold, but it sure is shiny!
Upgrade a boat to Lv 100 in Sailing. It'll turn gold to reflect its power!
Upgrade a boat to Lv 300 in Sailing. This is the pinnacle of naval prowess, it doesn't get fancier than this!
Unlock the 3rd Divinity God.
Unlock the 7th Divinity God.
Unlock the 10th and final Divinity God.
Get a POiNG score of 25,000 or more! My personal highscore is 38,323 at the time of coding this!
Harvest a plant with a Bit worth who's first 3 digits are 777. For example, 77.7K Bits would count, or 777M Bits too!
Harvest a total of 1000 Chemical-type Plants in Gaming.
Harvest a total of 500 Voraci-type Plants in Gaming.
Harvest a total of 100 Bonsai-type Plants in Gaming.
Make a trade with Blobby G worth a gold bar amount that starts with 777, like 777K or 7.77M for example. PS; 776 and 778 work too lol
Buy all 20 Boats in Sailing. Uh, yea, there is a scroll bar below the boats, you can buy more than 5 boats
On your Divine Knight, get an Orb Score of 400 or more on OJ Bay. This is the number above your Orb!
On your Siege Breaker, get a Flag Score of 150 or more on Erruption River. This is the number above your Flag!
On your Elemental Sorcerer, get a Wormhole Score of 83 or more on Niagrilled Falls. This is the number above your Wormhole!
Why did you even hire the poor fella in the first place???
Walk to a uh... weird location? Well it's not that weird, but it's just like, what ya doin' back there?
You got... zero? Literally zero?? Jeez, Im sorry but I think you need to uninstall
Get a Lava Skull or higher on every Smolderin' Plateau monster in the Deathnote. Yea, the 100M Kill Skull. This is gonna take a while.
Level up a Sailing Captain to Lv 15. Few captains in the universe can rival their ability to plunder!
Level up a Sailing Captain to Lv 10. They shall sail the seas with confidence!
Reach World 6, the Spirited Valley! You'll love it here, all the spirits are very friendly!
Have a stack of exactly 250,000 Ladybugs in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 5,000,000 Effervescent Logs in your Storage Chest.
Have a stack of exactly 100,000,000 Royal Headpiece in your Storage Chest.
Oh yea, that's a good number. Sure, it's no 69420, but it's vintage!
Get an overgrowth of 32x on a single crop.
Get an overgrowth of 1,024x on a single crop.
Get an overgrowth of 8,192x on a single crop.
Have 10,000 or more Apple crops in your Depot at once. You can lock the first crop before it grows to guarantee an apple!
Have 1,000,000 or more Corn crops in your Depot at once. Mmmm, Corn!
Find 30 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!
Find 70 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!
Find 110 unique crops, as shown by the Crop Scientist!
That's... That's enough... THATS ENOUGH INSTAGROWS!
Make a crop trade with the Legumulyte worth exactly 777 magic beans.
Get 27 plots of land in your farm.
Reach the Sneaking Floor with the Petrified Ceramist guest.
Reach what seems like the top Floor of Sneaking with the Eldar Kingulyte guest.
Untie 6 other Ninja Twins.
Successfully find 6 items in a row, in a single AFK claim within Sneaking.
Find a +50 Yellow Belt Sneaking Charm. Yes, exactly +50.
It's a shame you can't wear them all at once...
Get a Bloomy Summoning Familiar.
Get a Regalis Summoning Familiar.
Survive for 5 minutes in The King's Gambit. Find this feature in Cavern 14 of the Hole in world 5.
Get 10 Career Wins within Summoning
Get 25 Career Wins within Summoning
Get 58 Career Wins within Summoning
Reach Wave 50 in Breezy Battle without placing more than 5 Towers in total.
Complete all constellations in the Spirited Valley. You can check your progress within the Telescope.
Add 5 different golden foods to The Beanstalk.
Hampter is worth it!
You took out the baddest spirit of them all!
Add 14 different golden foods to The Beanstalk.
Get a Lava Skull or higher on every Spirited Valley monster in the Deathnote.
The_lil'_fella_REALLY_likes_icecream!
